ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave Musa the Book and appointed his brother Harun with him as a helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We gave Moses the Book, and made his brother Aaron his minister,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We gave Moses the Book and appointed his brother Aaron as his counsellor:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We gave the Book to Moses and made his brother Aaron his Minister.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We gave Moosa the Book and appointed with him his brother Haroon as a deputy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We gave Musa the Scripture, and placed his brother Harun with him as a helper;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We gave Musa the Book and We appointed with him his brother Haroun an aider.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We gave Moses the Book, and appointed with him his brother Aaron as minister
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We verily gave Moses the Scripture and placed with him his brother Aaron as henchman.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave Moses the Book, and appointed his brother Aaron as his supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We vouchsafed unto Musa the Book and We placed with him his brother Harun as a minister.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We gave Moses the Book and We made Aaron, his brother, accompany him as a minister.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Before this,) We sent Moses The Book, and appointed his brother Aaron with him as minister;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture [the Taurat (Torah)], and placed his brother Harun (Aaron) with him as a helper;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We gave the Book to Moses and gave him his brother Aaron as a minister.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We gave Moses the Scripture, and appointed his brother Aaron as his assistant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:35] And verily We gave Moses the Scripture, the Torah, and made Aaron, his brother, [go] with him as a minister, an assistant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We verify gave Moses the Scripture) the Torah (and placed with him his brother Aaron as henchman) as helper.
